title: Getting Banned For Having Corrupted Files.
body: I GOT BANNED FOR HAVING A CORRUPTED GAME AND I HAD NO IDEA! ITS FIXED NOW BUT I HAD TO REPAIR IT AND BY THE TIME IT WAS REPAIRED THE GAME WAS ENDED AND NOW I HAVE A BAN. Riot im begging you make the leaverbuster shorter and fix all these corrupted files. STOP BEING MONEY HUNGRY AND STOP FAVOR THE COMPETITIVE PLAY!
